sys_script.name: Check resolution notes before resolving

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1527610_hrm_hr_tickets</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1527610_hrm_hr_tickets">state=Resolved^resolution_notesISEMPTY^EQ<item display_value="Resolved" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Resolved"/><item endquery="false" field="resolution_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Check resolution notes before resolving</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	current.state = '';
	gs.addErrorMessage('Resolution Notes must be filled in before resolving the ticket');
	current.setAbortAction(true);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-19 07:32:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>45535a2447341210079550fe316d43e3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check resolution notes before resolving</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="HRM" source="x_1527610_hrm">25a151d047301210079550fe316d4354</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="HRM">25a151d047301210079550fe316d4354</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_45535a2447341210079550fe316d43e3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-19 08:10:43</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=45535a2447341210079550fe316d43e3"/></record_update>
